fields.text: Thank you for calling Instacart in San Francisco, delivering groceries in as little as one hour.
To place a new grocery delivery order, press [INDEX].
To speak with a sales specialist about our delivery options, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you with our sales team. Your call is important to us.
To learn about current promotions and savings, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we retrieve the latest promotions. Thank you for your patience.
For order support and existing orders, press [INDEX].
To track the status of your current order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we look up your order status. We appreciate your patience.
To modify or cancel an existing order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we process your request. Please stay on the line.
